00021 #include "AuditFileConstants.h"

00023 #include "StringUtils.h"

00025 
00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_array;
00027 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00028 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_parameter;
00029 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00030 using namespace std;

00046 /*
00047  * Read the entire file.
00048  */
00049 bool AuditFileReader::Read(const std::string &fileName, affymetrix_calvin_array::ArrayAuditEntryList &auditData)
00050 {
00051         auditData.clear();
00052 
00053         // Open the file.
00054         std::ifstream fileStream;
00055         fileStream.open(fileName.c_str(), std::ios::in);
00056         if (!fileStream)
00057         {
00058                 return false;
00059         }
00060 
00061         ArrayAuditEntry entry;
00062         DateTime dateTime;
00063         const int MAX_LINE_LENGTH = 1024;
00064         char buf[MAX_LINE_LENGTH];
00065         std::string line;
00066         std::string name;
00067         std::string value;
00068 
00069         // Read the lines of the file.
00070         while (fileStream.getline(buf, MAX_LINE_LENGTH))
00071         {
00072                 line = buf;
00073 
00074                 // Start tag
00075                 if (line == AUDIT_START_TAG)
00076                 {
00077                         dateTime.Clear();
00078                         entry.Clear();
00079                         continue;
00080                 }
00081 
00082                 // End tag
00083                 else if (line == AUDIT_END_TAG)
00084                 {
00085                         entry.DateTime() = dateTime;
00086                         auditData.push_back(entry);
00087                         continue;
00088                 }
00089 
00090                 // Split the line to the name and value separated by a = sign
00091                 const char *index = strstr(line.c_str(), "=");
00092                 if (index)
00093                 {
00094                         value = index+1;
00095                         name = line.substr(0, line.length()-strlen(index));
00096 
00097                         // User name tag
00098                         if (name == AUDIT_USER_TAG)
00099                                 entry.UserName() = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(value);
00100 
00101                         // Date time
00102                         else if (name == AUDIT_DATE_TAG)
00103                                 dateTime.Date(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(value));
00104 
00105                         // Date time
00106                         else if (name == AUDIT_TIME_TAG)
00107                                 dateTime.Time(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(value));
00108 
00109                         // Action
00110                         else if (name == AUDIT_ACTION_TAG)
00111                                 entry.ActionType() = value;
00112 
00113                         // Array id
00114                         else if (name == AUDIT_ARRAY_ID_TAG)
00115                                 entry.ArrayGuid() = value;
00116 
00117                         // Input id
00118                         else if (name == AUDIT_INPUT_ID_TAG)
00119                                 entry.InputFileGuids().push_back(value);
00120 
00121                         // Output id
00122                         else if (name == AUDIT_OUTPUT_ID_TAG)
00123                                 entry.OutputFileGuids().push_back(value);
00124 
00125                         // Parameter name/value pair.
00126                         else
00127                         {
00128                                 ParameterNameValuePair param;
00129                                 param.Name = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(name);
00130                                 param.Value = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(value);
00131                                 entry.ActionParameters().push_back(param);
00132                         }
00133                 }
00134         }
00135 
00136         // Close the file and return the status
00137         fileStream.close();
00138         return (fileStream.fail() != 0);
00139 }
